products.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Infusion ASC Lime Green
products.description: Infusion asc perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. The advanced solar coating on the reverse of the fabric significantly reduces heat and glare entering your room, making them ideal for south facing windows and conservatories. Perfect fit pleated blind infusion asc lime green available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Infusion Solar Lime Green Neat Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Infusion solar not only brings fresh varied colours to your home but the added benefit of a solar control coating to reduce direct sunlight reducing harmful uv rays, keeping furnishings looking vibrant. This subtle lime green shade envokes nature and brighter days - especially during darker winter months. Product id: db-nfpl0004 fabric colour: lime green material: 100% polyester headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.

products.title: Infusion Solar Lime Green Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays. The infusion solar lime green pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. Product id: db-pls0087 fabric colour: lime green headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.
